home.about_us_text: We're dedicated to protecting marine life and ensuring the safety of dolphins, whales, and their habitats. Explore our platform to stay informed on current and past marine incidents, track key areas for responsible marine tourism, and access valuable e-learning resources tailored for those working in marine environments.
